author: @88fjoe
text: as a newcomer to golf during the pandemic I'm absolutely hooked by the sport and find your content a gem :) hopefully more and more golf equipment manufacturers will incorporate ML/AI into the process of making the clubs which also present itself as a great marketing opportunity such as what Callaway is already doing. I'm hopeful that the future of the golf simulation market relys on visual based ML/AI and will drive the costs down for the barrier of entry so that more ppl can enjoy golfing at home!
